title: Protect Yohane-chan!
detail_text: <:th_ch0207/>I will now announce the agenda for today’s A・ZU・NA meeting. We will discuss our next live performance… but before that, we have to talk about Yosh-... Yohane-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>I wanted to talk about her too. I think that we’re the only ones who know her secret, so...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Are you two... actually serious?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Of course we are!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Yeah. Yohane-chan says that she can defeat the angels with her magic, but I’m sure that she would be nervous about fighting alone.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>You really believe this...? Never mind, if you two have decided to trust in her, then I will follow you to the bitter end. Let’s protect Yohane-san from the angels!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Yeah! So, that would make us the little demons who protect Yohane-san, right? In that case, that would mean that we could receive some magical power from Yohane-san, wouldn’t it...? To be honest, I’m a little interested.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Wouldn’t it be dangerous for people who are unfamiliar with it to wield this power?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Then we must become stronger. Let’s discover what training we must undergo to be strong enough to control this power!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Let’s go ask Yohane-san~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
